name: S U M I
description:
Sumo based minimalistic game.

Just move and make your enemy go out of the Dohyö (Sumo circle)

Made for the #Minimalistic Jam 3

Try to control your stamina bar!

Play alone or with friends!!! (Singleplayer is somewhat broken)

Player 1 Controls: WASD

Player 2 Controls:  Arrows

This is my first game, I made it in 2 days.
